gameStructure

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameStructure.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Class of the Game, it initializes the board, the players and launch the game
    Author:
    ostrowst

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game() 
      Game(Board b)
      Constructor of a Game, it initializes the board that will be used for this game.

      Cell computeTargetCell(Cell targetCell, int dice)
      Returns the cell really reached by the move.
      void displayTrace(Cell previousCell, Cell targetCell, Cell realCell, int dice)
      Displays the trace for the GooseCells, TeleportCells and NormalCells.
      void initializePlayers()
      Initializes the players and adds them to the player list.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void movePlayer(Cell realCell)
      It moves a player in the cell he has to be, if there is another player in this cell, it swaps the two players
      Player nextPlayer(int idCurrentPlayer)
      Returns the next player of the list of players, if he is the last player, it goes back to the first one in the list.
      void play()
      Main method of the game, it launches the game until a player wins.
      int throwDie()
      Random throw of a die, returns a number between one and six

      • computeTargetCell

        public Cell computeTargetCell(Cell targetCell,
                     int dice)
        Returns the cell really reached by the move.
        Parameters:
        targetCell - The cell normally reached by the player
        dice - Value of the throw of the dice
        Returns:
        The cell truly reached by the player

      • displayTrace

        public void displayTrace(Cell previousCell,
                Cell targetCell,
                Cell realCell,
                int dice)
        Displays the trace for the GooseCells, TeleportCells and NormalCells.
        Parameters:
        previousCell - Previous cell of the current player
        targetCell - Cell normally reached by the player after the throws
        realCell - Cell really reached by the player
        dice - Value of the throws

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(Cell realCell)

        realCell - The cell really reached by the player
